metadata.title: CVE-2020-6796 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A content process could have modified shared memory relating to crashreporting information, crash itself, and cause an out-of-bound write. Thiscould have caused memory corruption and a potentially exploitable crash.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 73 and Firefox < ESR68.5.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
